page.title: 12THE METHWOLD TIMES
page.content: "The Methwold Times" "The Methwold Times" is a newsletter which is published every month. It includes reports from the various clubs and organisations in the village,i.e. the playgroup, primary school, fete committee, dancing club, W.I., youth group,brownies, cubs and scouts; and publishes the minutes of the Parish Council meetings, advance notices of events happening in the village, and a list of services in the Church and Chapel. The newsletter has been published for five years, and is run by a committee of five people who collect the information, edit, type and print it. The newsletter is financed by donations from village organisations and individuals,and a charge is made for advertisements in the "Times."
